text: Fantasy-Faction is a website and community for fans of fantasy fiction. They share news, reviews and interviews about books in the fantasy, science fiction, horror, and other speculative fiction genres. It was founded by Marc Aplin and has won or been nominated for genre awards including: * British Fantasy Award Nomination – 2013, 2014, & 2016 * World Fantasy Award Nomination – 2014 ==References== ==External links== * Category:Fantasy fiction websites Category:British entertainment websites
title: Fantasy Faction
